name.ja: <ruby>超<rt>ちょう</rt></ruby><ruby>重<rt>じゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>武<rt>む</rt></ruby><ruby>者<rt>しゃ</rt></ruby>ドウ<ruby>Ｃ－Ｎ<rt>シン</rt></ruby>

text.en: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 face-up Machine Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck to your hand. If you have no Spells/Traps in your GY: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 EARTH Machine monster with 1500 or less ATK from your hand or GY, except "Superheavy Samurai Constable". You can only use each effect of "Superheavy Samurai Constable" once per turn.
